Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti with a black lappet wig, a brown face, a red and blue collar edged with black surrounding the brown hands holding two red hoes, the body is white, the legs inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground bordered with black lines, the back has a red seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nu-pots.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
